MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH4 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Telford Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on site at Crewe Toll substation and confirmed the power cut has been caused by an underground cable fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.09pm on Thursday 21st January 2021.
